definition: each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
mutual exchange of assistance (idiom)/to reciprocate with material assistance

sentences.english: With love at first sight, our hearts are linked, changing the moment into eternal love.
sentences.chinese: 只是一见钟情，两颗心已相通，刹那化成永恒情浓。

sentences.english: Chinese artists believe that calligraphy and painting share one common source.
sentences.chinese: 国画家们相信书法和绘画是相通的。

sentences.english: And evetually the Chinese people chose Marxism, for which is related by blood with the Chinese traditional culture.
sentences.chinese: 马克思主义和中国传统文化血脉是相通的。

sentences.english: He have a great feeling of the communion between himself and the hill and lake.
sentences.chinese: 他深感自己与大自然是息息相通的。

sentences.english: eg:Her bedroom communicates with the bathroom.
It seems to join the billiard-room on purpose.
sentences.chinese: 它与弹子房相通，好像有意满足我们的需要似的。

sentences.english: Staggered the same path in the field, between the villages can hear the voice of the crow like dogs.
sentences.chinese: 田间小路交错相通，村落间能听到鸡鸣狗叫的声音。

sentences.english: Economic man and moral man's inter-osculation.
sentences.chinese: 经济人与道德人的相通。

sentences.english: Talk with similar minds on things cannot be measured monetarily.
sentences.chinese: 和相通的心灵探讨那些无法用物质来衡量的事物。

sentences.english: Hold it in the palm or wear in front, it can have the same breath with you.
sentences.chinese: 握在手心或戴与胸前，就能与你气息相通。

sentences.english: The Beidaihe inland water transportation is extremely developed, it is interlinked with the Beijing-Hangzhou Canal.
sentences.chinese: 北戴河内河运输十分发达，与京杭大运河相通。

sentences.english: The foundation of such mass-based thoughts is that the mass are naturally born and they can communicate with nature.
sentences.chinese: 民本思想建构的理论基础是民由天生，民天相通。

sentences.english: In the diagram at the left, this is through a patent ductus arteriosus.
sentences.chinese: 在左图，则通过未闭的动脉导管相通。

sentences.english: It communicates with the back urethra through ejaculation duct.
sentences.chinese: 精囊通过射精管与后尿道相通。

sentences.english: The living room communicates  with the dining room.
Mencius thinks that Heaven and human beings are interlinked.
sentences.chinese: 关于天人关系，孟子认为天与人二者是相通的。

definition: grasp this fundamental point and all the rest will follow (idiom)
different routes to the same destination (idiom); fig. different means of achieve the same end
to link/to join/to attach/connection/a link (on web page)
to blend into one another/to blend together well
traceable to the same stock (idiom); of a common origin (of trends, ideas etc)
variant of 交匯|交汇/to flow together/confluence (of rivers, airflow, roads)/(international) cooperation
to flow together/confluence (of rivers, airflow, roads)/(international) cooperation
